EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of MONC.MI M&A conference call or presentation 7-Dec-20 8:00am GMT
EventStory.Body:
Moncler SpA to Discuss the Joining of Stone Island Call
Milan Dec 17, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Moncler SpA M&A conference call or presentation Monday, December 7, 2020 at 8:00:00am GMT
TEXT version of Transcript
